articles.description: EE customers will now have to pay £2 a day extra to use their smartphones on the Continent after the network changed its policy
articles.content: Long queues, cancelled flights, Westminsters baffling traffic light system, and now a call from Angela Merkel and Emmanuel Macron to force British tourists arriving in Europe to quarantine - it would… [+1117 chars]
